column1: #Text=Polycrystalline NbP powder was synthesized in a direct reaction of Nb powder (99.9%) and red phosphorous pieces (99.999%) in an evacuated silica tube for 48 h at 800 °C.
#Text=Single NbP crystals were grown from this powder in a chemical transport reaction with iodine as a transport agent.
#Text=The source and sink were set to 950 °C and 850 °C, respectively.
#Text=The VSM measurements were conducted in a Quantum Design PPMS cryostat with a VSM Option.
